definition: to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: The backplane eliminates the necessity of wiring the card outputs together externally.
sentences.chinese: 采用背板的方式无需在外部通过接线连接插卡的输出。

sentences.english: The telephone operator who looks up telephong(telephone) numbers uses a computer.
sentences.chinese: 电话接线员使用电脑来查询电话号码。

sentences.english: The box can be used for both cable and steel pipe.
sentences.chinese: 接线箱结构形式分电缆布线和钢管布线两种。

sentences.english: Does the rewired ferret come to hear with its eyes?
sentences.chinese: 重新接线的雪貂用它的眼睛来听声音吗？

sentences.english: A:Operator?I want to make a call back to China.
sentences.chinese: 接线生吗？我想打电话回中国。

sentences.english: The receptionist schedules all the doctor's appointments twenty minutes apart.
sentences.chinese: 接线员将医生所有的预约排程为间隔二十分钟。

sentences.english: Operator, I'd like to call Taibei, please. Station-to-station.
sentences.chinese: 接线生，我要打到台北的叫号电话。

sentences.english: I'm afraid all calls to guest room must go through the operator.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，所有打到客房的电话都要通过我们接线生转。

sentences.english: Unlabelled terminals must not be used as "tie points" for other wires.
sentences.chinese: 不可将无标号的接线端当成其它导线的“结点”。

sentences.english: D. Itss s qualified cable and different sizes.
sentences.chinese: 连接线质量好，而且有不同的尺寸。

sentences.english: Operator,I'd like to make a collet call,please.
sentences.chinese: 接线员，我要打对方付费的电话。

sentences.english: Does your area have training standards for 911 operators?
sentences.chinese: 你所在的区域有没有给911接线员设立培训标准呢？

sentences.english: The paper presents a method to evaluate the reliability of bus configuration by the time sequential simulation.
sentences.chinese: 提出了用时序模拟法对电气主接线进行可靠性评估。

sentences.english: Hello, operator. I'd like to make a person-to-person call to San Francisco.
sentences.chinese: 你好，接线员，我想往旧金山打个私人电话。

sentences.english: If mass-terminated cables are used, mating receptacles can be mounted at the test fixture.
sentences.chinese: 如果采用接线头电缆，在夹具上则可以安装匹配插座。

sentences.english: The electrician bungled the wiring job.
sentences.chinese: 电工笨拙地做接线工作。

definition: abbr. for 搭鐵接線|搭铁接线/chassis grounding (i.e. using the chassis as ground, to serve as a return path for current in an electric circuit)
